Text:
Four of south Florida’s fiercest salvage companies go head-to-head saving sinking ships, rescuing boats caught in deadly hurricanes and raising boats from the ocean floor.

The competition is fierce and failure is not an option. The first crew to arrive on the scene is the one that gets the job – and makes a profit – while the other crews get nothing.

Classification: Reality
Genre: Action | Adventure | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Mondays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 14, 2013
